column1: #Text=Erode is a city in Tamil Nadu in South India , likely to be called by various names such as Textile City , Turmeric City or Loom City of India .
#Text=Erode , as the headquarters of Erode district , has an extensive highway and road network .
#Text=The Tamil Nadu State Road Transport Corporation operates huge fleet of buses from Erode to almost all places of the state and to neighboring states like Kerala , Karnataka and Andhra Pradesh .
#Text=There are lot of trains available from all parts of Tamil Nadu .
#Text=Catch Cheran , Nilgiri , Kovai , Yercaud , Allepey and all Kerala-bound trains from Chennai Central .
#Text=Bannari Amman Temple is 75 km away from Erode and 10 km distance from Sathyamangalam .
#Text=It is the famous temple in Erode District and situated at the bottom of the Western Ghats and on the way to Mysore .
#Text=Sangameshwarar Temple , Bhavani is about 12 km . from Erode .
#Text=The famous Sangameshwara Temple is on the shores of the Bhavani river .
#Text=Three rivers by name Cauvery , Bhavani and invisible Amudha merge at this pilgrimage place .
#Text=Bhavanisagar Dam is about 16 km from Sathyamangalam across the river Bhavani .
#Text=Birds Sanctuary , Vellode - is about 15 km from Erode
#Text=Chennimalai - is about 30 km . from Erode and 12 km from Perundurai
#Text=Government Museum , was opened to the public in 1987 .
#Text=The important exhibits are inscription of Kongu Chola , hero stones from Bargur , Tanjore paintings , manuscripts , coins , geological objects , Kodumanal antiques and other pre-history items .
#Text=It has both botanical and zoological specimens also .
#Text=The Museum is known for its collection of palm-leaf manuscripts and coins .
#Text=Kodiveri Dam is about 10 km from Gobichettipalayam and 55 km from Erode
#Text=Periyar Memorial House ( Thanthai Periyar Memorial House ) .
#Text=a museum depicting the life history of Periyar E. V. Ramasamy
#Text=IHindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva located approximately 15 miles from Erode .
#Text=This historical fort ; maintained by the Archeological Survey of India , is located about 22 km from Erode .
#Text=Sivanmalai - is about 50 km . from Erode and 5 km to Kangayam
#Text=Gobichetti palayam is a famous cinema shooting spot near to Erode .
#Text=Known for its name " Textile City " - Erode is famous for its Textile market where you can purchase textile products ( Bedspreads , shirting and suiting ... ) for very low prices .
#Text=Textile merchants from various parts of India converge here for Textile trading , especially in cotton materials .
#Text=Erode is also famous for Turmeric ( Manjal ) which is a natural anti-septic powder .
#Text=TexValley , NH - 544 , Salem - Cochin Highway , Gangapuram , Chithode , ☏ +919688128555 , toll-free : +91 1800 42 555 555 , ✉ info@texvalley.info .
#Text=An integrated textile shopping mall housing both daily and weekly market stalls .
#Text=you can find Parotta , Dosai , Idly etc. You will also be able to locate a lot of multi-cuisine restaurants in an around Erode .
#Text=Both the vegetarian and the non-vegetarian people could have a tasty and tummy full food cheaper than other cities in Tamil Nadu .
#Text=Lot of bar available in and around erode city .
